body_html:
So, this change is actually going in the opposite direction it should've gone. LiteralUtil is on the way out. I'm working on a patch that is getting rid of it.

It's not a big deal that this change is in, but note that I will be moving the new code inside xla::Literal.

body:
So, this change is actually going in the opposite direction it should've gone.  LiteralUtil is on the way out.  I'm working on a patch that is getting rid of it.

It's not a big deal that this change is in, but note that I will be moving the new code inside xla::Literal.
